item.title: Holy Water Joe
item.description: Holy Water Joe is a 1971 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Mario Gariazzo.

item.title: His Name Was King
item.description: His Name Was King is a 1971 Italian Western film directed by Giancarlo Romitelli and starring Klaus Kinski.

item.title: Reverend's Colt
item.description: Reverend's Colt is a 1970 Spanish-Italian Spaghetti Western directed by León Klimovsky.

item.title: Centomila dollari per Ringo
item.description: 100.000 dollari per Ringo is a 1965 spaghetti western film directed by Alberto De Martino.

item.title: Vengeance
item.description: Vengeance is a 1968 Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Antonio Margheriti. It starred Richard Harrison, Mariangela Giordano and Luciano Pigozzi.

item.title: Between God
item.description: Between God, the Devil and a Winchester is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Marino Girolami. The story is based on Treasure island by Robert Louis Stevenson..

item.title: Duello nel Texas
item.description: Duello nel Texas, also known as Gunfight at Red Sands and Gringo, is a 1963 Italian/Spanish international co-production directed by Ricardo Blasco and Mario Caiano, and produced by Albert Band as his first spaghetti western. It was also the first Western to feature a score by Ennio Morricone and the second spaghetti western to star Richard Harrison.
